abstract: Two philanthropic groups will join forces to help stars verify the records of people who want to hire them.
snippet: Two philanthropic groups will join forces to help stars verify the records of people who want to hire them.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

lead_paragraph: Two philanthropic organizations are uniting to save celebrities like Hilary Swank and Beyoncé from the embarrassment of getting caught taking money from people or groups that abuse human rights.

headline.main: Groups Will Help Celebrities Avoid Embarrassment on Human Rights
